en-US.title: CulturaFlow - Cultural Learning Made Fun
en-US.subtitle: Discover World Cultures Through Interactive Learning
en-US.description:
CulturaFlow transforms cultural education into an engaging, gamified experience. Explore diverse traditions, languages, customs, and histories from around the world through interactive content, quizzes, and challenges.

Key Features:
• 🌍 Comprehensive cultural content from 100+ countries
• 🎮 Gamified learning with achievements and progress tracking
• 📚 AI-powered personalized content recommendations
• 🏆 Challenge friends and compete on leaderboards
• 📱 Offline mode for learning anywhere
• 🎨 Beautiful, intuitive interface designed for all ages
• 🔊 Audio pronunciations and cultural music
• 📖 Stories and legends from different cultures

Whether you're a student, educator, traveler, or simply curious about the world, CulturaFlow makes cultural learning accessible, enjoyable, and meaningful. Build your cultural knowledge while earning badges, unlocking achievements, and connecting with a global community of learners.

Join thousands of users discovering the rich tapestry of human culture. Download CulturaFlow today and start your journey around the world!
en-US.promotional_text: Discover world cultures through fun, interactive learning! Perfect for students, travelers, and curious minds.

es-ES.title: CulturaFlow - Aprendizaje Cultural Divertido
es-ES.subtitle: Descubre las Culturas del Mundo con Aprendizaje Interactivo
es-ES.description:
CulturaFlow transforma la educación cultural en una experiencia atractiva y gamificada. Explora tradiciones diversas, idiomas, costumbres e historias de todo el mundo a través de contenido interactivo, cuestionarios y desafíos.

Características principales:
• 🌍 Contenido cultural integral de más de 100 países
• 🎮 Aprendizaje gamificado con logros y seguimiento de progreso
• 📚 Recomendaciones de contenido personalizadas con IA
• 🏆 Desafía amigos y compite en tablas de clasificación
• 📱 Modo sin conexión para aprender en cualquier lugar
• 🎨 Interfaz hermosa e intuitiva diseñada para todas las edades
• 🔊 Pronunciaciones de audio y música cultural
• 📖 Historias y leyendas de diferentes culturas

review_information.review_notes:
CulturaFlow is an educational app focused on cultural learning. All content is family-friendly and educational. The app includes:

1. Cultural content sourced from reliable educational sources
2. Gamification elements to encourage learning
3. User accounts for progress tracking
4. Optional social features for friendly competition

No inappropriate content, violence, or mature themes. Suitable for ages 4+.
